markdown:
# Vocabulary

We've looked at quite reusable structures so far, so lets take a look at some ways that we can switch out some words for other items:

## Drinks

### Teas

Tae dubh  
Teh duv  
Black tea  

Tae glas  
Teh gloss  
Green tea  

Tae luibhe  
Teh LIV-eh  
Herbal tea  

Tae le líomóid  
Teh leh LEE-oh-mohd  
Tea with lemon  

Tae le bainne  
Teh leh BAN-yuh  
Tea with milk  


### Coffees

Caife dubh  
KAH-feh duv  
Black coffee  

Caife bán  
KAH-feh bawn  
White coffee  

Meiriceánach  
meh-rih-KAWN-akh  
Americano  

Caifé latte  
kah-FAY LAH-teh  
Latte  

Cappuccino  
kah-poo-CHEE-no  
Cappuccino  

Maicéató  
mah-KAY-oh-toh  
Macchiato  

Mócha  
MOH-khah  
Mocha  

Seacláid the  
SHAK-lawd heh  
Hot chocolate  

---

## Milks & Alternatives

Bainne  
BAN-yuh  
Milk  

Bainne leathbhearrtha  
BAN-yuh lah-VYAR-huh  
Semi-skimmed milk  

Bainne lánbhearrtha  
BAN-yuh lawn-VYAR-huh  
Whole milk  

Bainne coirce  
BAN-yuh KIR-keh  
Oat milk  

Bainne soighe  
BAN-yuh SOY-eh  
Soy milk  

Bainne almóinní  
BAN-yuh al-MOAN-ee  
Almond milk  

Bainne cnó cócó  
BAN-yuh knoh KOH-koh  
Coconut milk  

---

## Add-ons

Uachtar  
OO-akh-tur  
Cream  

Gan uachtar  
Gon OO-akh-tur  
Without cream  

Le huachtar  
Leh HOO-akh-tur  
With cream  

Le leamhacháin  
Leh LAV-uh-khawn  
With marshmallows  

Gan leamhacháin  
Gon LAV-uh-khawn  
Without marshmallows  

Le siúcra  
Leh SHOO-kruh  
With sugar  

Gan siúcra  
Gon SHOO-kruh  
Without sugar  

Mil  
Mil  
Honey  

---

## Dietary Options

Véagánach  
VAY-gawn-akh  
Vegan  

Bainne véagánach  
BAN-yuh VAY-gawn-akh  
Vegan milk  

Uachtar véagánach  
OO-akh-tur VAY-gawn-akh  
Vegan cream  

Leamhacháin véagánacha  
LAV-uh-khawn VAY-gawn-uh-khuh  
Vegan marshmallows  

Gan lachtós  
Gon LAKH-tohs  
Lactose-free  

---

## Prices

Swap these into:

Sin ___ euro.  
Dhá euro  
Ghaw YUR-oh  

€2  
Dhá euro caoga  
Ghaw YUR-oh KWAY-guh  

€2.50  
Trí euro  
Tree YUR-oh  

€3  
Trí euro fiche  
Tree YUR-oh FI-heh  

€3.20  

Trí euro caoga  
Tree YUR-oh KWAY-guh  
€3.50  

Ceithre euro  
KEH-hruh YUR-oh  
€4  

Ceithre euro caoga  
KEH-hruh YUR-oh KWAY-guh  
€4.50  

Cúig euro  
Koo-ig YUR-oh  
€5  

For extra charges:

Deich cent breise  
Jeh sent BRESH-eh  
10 cent extra  

Fiche cent breise  
FI-heh sent BRESH-eh  
20 cent extra  

Caoga cent breise  
KWAY-guh sent BRESH-eh  
50 cent extra  

Euro breise  
YUR-oh BRESH-eh  
€1 extra  

---

## Useful Swaps

Instead of:

Cupán tae, le do thoil.  

Try:

Caifé latte, le bainne coirce, le do thoil.  
kah-FAY LAH-teh, leh BAN-yuh KIR-keh, leh duh hull  
Latte with oat milk, please.  

Seacláid the, gan uachtar, le do thoil.  
SHAK-lawd heh, gon OO-akh-tur, leh duh hull  
Hot chocolate without cream, please.  

Cappuccino, le bainne almóinní, le do thoil.  
kah-poo-CHEE-no, leh BAN-yuh al-MOAN-ee, leh duh hull  
Cappuccino with almond milk, please.  

Tae glas, gan siúcra, le do thoil.  
Teh gloss, gon SHOO-kruh, leh duh hull  
Green tea without sugar, please.  

---

## Clarification Questions (Barista)

An bhfuil bainne coirce uait?  
Un will BAN-yuh KIR-keh oo-it?  
Would you like oat milk?  

Le huachtar?  
Leh HOO-akh-tur?  
With cream?  

Ar mhaith leat siúcra?  
Er wah lyat SHOO-kruh?  
Would you like sugar?  

Rud ar bith eile?  
Rud er bih EL-eh?  
Anything else?  

Beag nó mór?  
Byug noh mohr?  
Small or large?

blocks.text: Vocabulary
We've looked at quite reusable structures so far, so lets take a look at some ways that we can switch out some words for other items:
Drinks
Teas
Tae dubh Teh duv Black tea
Tae glas Teh gloss Green tea
Tae luibhe Teh LIV-eh Herbal tea
Tae le líomóid Teh leh LEE-oh-mohd Tea with lemon
Tae le bainne Teh leh BAN-yuh Tea with milk
Coffees
Caife dubh KAH-feh duv Black coffee
Caife bán KAH-feh bawn White coffee
Meiriceánach meh-rih-KAWN-akh Americano
Caifé latte kah-FAY LAH-teh Latte
Cappuccino kah-poo-CHEE-no Cappuccino
Maicéató mah-KAY-oh-toh Macchiato
Mócha MOH-khah Mocha
Seacláid the SHAK-lawd heh Hot chocolate
Milks & Alternatives
Bainne BAN-yuh Milk
Bainne leathbhearrtha BAN-yuh lah-VYAR-huh Semi-skimmed milk
Bainne lánbhearrtha BAN-yuh lawn-VYAR-huh Whole milk
Bainne coirce BAN-yuh KIR-keh Oat milk
Bainne soighe BAN-yuh SOY-eh Soy milk
Bainne almóinní BAN-yuh al-MOAN-ee Almond milk
Bainne cnó cócó BAN-yuh knoh KOH-koh Coconut milk
Add-ons
Uachtar OO-akh-tur Cream
Gan uachtar Gon OO-akh-tur Without cream
Le huachtar Leh HOO-akh-tur With cream
Le leamhacháin Leh LAV-uh-khawn With marshmallows
Gan leamhacháin Gon LAV-uh-khawn Without marshmallows
Le siúcra Leh SHOO-kruh With sugar
Gan siúcra Gon SHOO-kruh Without sugar
Mil Mil Honey
Dietary Options
Véagánach VAY-gawn-akh Vegan
Bainne véagánach BAN-yuh VAY-gawn-akh Vegan milk
Uachtar véagánach OO-akh-tur VAY-gawn-akh Vegan cream
Leamhacháin véagánacha LAV-uh-khawn VAY-gawn-uh-khuh Vegan marshmallows
Gan lachtós Gon LAKH-tohs Lactose-free
Prices
Swap these into:
Sin ___ euro. Dhá euro Ghaw YUR-oh
€2 Dhá euro caoga Ghaw YUR-oh KWAY-guh
€2.50 Trí euro Tree YUR-oh
€3 Trí euro fiche Tree YUR-oh FI-heh
Trí euro caoga Tree YUR-oh KWAY-guh €3.50
Ceithre euro KEH-hruh YUR-oh €4
Ceithre euro caoga KEH-hruh YUR-oh KWAY-guh €4.50
Cúig euro Koo-ig YUR-oh €5
For extra charges:
Deich cent breise Jeh sent BRESH-eh 10 cent extra
Fiche cent breise FI-heh sent BRESH-eh 20 cent extra
Caoga cent breise KWAY-guh sent BRESH-eh 50 cent extra
Euro breise YUR-oh BRESH-eh €1 extra
Useful Swaps
Instead of:
Cupán tae, le do thoil.
Try:
Caifé latte, le bainne coirce, le do thoil. kah-FAY LAH-teh, leh BAN-yuh KIR-keh, leh duh hull Latte with oat milk, please.
Seacláid the, gan uachtar, le do thoil. SHAK-lawd heh, gon OO-akh-tur, leh duh hull Hot chocolate without cream, please.
Cappuccino, le bainne almóinní, le do thoil. kah-poo-CHEE-no, leh BAN-yuh al-MOAN-ee, leh duh hull Cappuccino with almond milk, please.
Tae glas, gan siúcra, le do thoil. Teh gloss, gon SHOO-kruh, leh duh hull Green tea without sugar, please.
Clarification Questions (Barista)
An bhfuil bainne coirce uait? Un will BAN-yuh KIR-keh oo-it? Would you like oat milk?
Le huachtar? Leh HOO-akh-tur? With cream?
Ar mhaith leat siúcra? Er wah lyat SHOO-kruh? Would you like sugar?
Rud ar bith eile? Rud er bih EL-eh? Anything else?
Beag nó mór? Byug noh mohr? Small or large?
